plot: A drama about some artists living together in an old board school out in the country in Iceland. Some are lucky some are not.
title: Glæpur og samviska
plot_es: A drama about some artists living together in an old board school out in the country in Iceland. Some are lucky some are not.
plot_en: A drama about some artists living together in an old board school out in the country in Iceland. Some are lucky some are not.
